about_the_game:
Ships to sink, cargo to loot, chests to find, quests to complete, islands to conquer and an open world to dominate.

Barbarossa is an open world game where you can live out your wildest pirate dreams and become the ultimate captain of your own ship. Start by hiring your own crew and stocking up on supplies. The journey ahead will be treacherous, but with the right crew and provisions, you can conquer any challenge that comes your way.

Once you set sail, you'll come across islands occupied by the kingdom or the pirates. But fear not, you can negotiate with them and even work for them if you must. But remember, there's always an opportunity to turn the tables and take their treasure for your own.



Upgrade your ship with new cannons, sails, and even add more ships to your fleet to conquer new territories. Sink ships belonging to the kingdom or the pirates and take control of their lands. And the best part? You get to keep all the spoils of your victories!



But becoming the ultimate pirate captain means more than just sinking ships and looting treasure. You must master both the art of trade and the art of war. Expand your fleet with new warships and cargo ships. The former will allow you to take on larger and more powerful enemies, while the latter will increase your trading capabilities and make you even richer. Your fleet will become an unstoppable force, feared by all who cross your path.

In Barbarossa, you'll have to outwit and outfight other fleets to emerge victorious. And when you do, you'll have the opportunity to control other islands and all the goods that come with it.
